languages.text: {n}Офицер нервно поправляет ворот мундира, резко ставший слишком тесным.{/n} "Ис-исправимся. Сей же час, клянусь Троном, исправимся!"
{n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер нервно поправляет ворот мундира, резко ставший слишком тесным.{/n} "Ис-исправимся. Сей же час, клянусь Троном, исправимся!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"
{n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"
{n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"
{n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"
{n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"

languages.text: {n}その士官は緊張して襟を引っ張ったせいか、突然きつくなってしまったようだ。{/n}「わ、我々がすぐに解決いたします。早急に。王座に誓って！」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}その士官は緊張して襟を引っ張ったせいか、突然きつくなってしまったようだ。{/n}「わ、我々がすぐに解決いたします。早急に。王座に誓って！」

languages.text: {n}L'officier glisse un doigt dans son col, qui semble soudainement trop serré autour de son cou.{/n} « N-nous allons régler ce problème. Le plus rapidement possible, je le jure sur le Trône ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier glisse un doigt dans son col, qui semble soudainement trop serré autour de son cou.{/n} « N-nous allons régler ce problème. Le plus rapidement possible, je le jure sur le Trône ! »

languages.text: {n}军官紧张地拽了拽衣领，好像衣领突然扣得太紧了一样。{/n}“我……我们马上就解决这个问题！立刻解决！我向黄金王座发誓！”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}军官紧张地拽了拽衣领，好像衣领突然扣得太紧了一样。{/n}“我……我们马上就解决这个问题！立刻解决！我向黄金王座发誓！”

languages.text: {n}El oficial se abrocha con nerviosismo el cuello de su atuendo, que de repente no parece ser muy cómodo.{/n} «L-le pondremos remedio. Enseguida, de hecho. ¡Lo juro por el Trono!».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial se abrocha con nerviosismo el cuello de su atuendo, que de repente no parece ser muy cómodo.{/n} «L-le pondremos remedio. Enseguida, de hecho. ¡Lo juro por el Trono!».

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier zupft nervös an seinem Kragen herum, der ihm wohl plötzlich zu eng geworden ist.{/n} "W-Wir korrigieren das. Unverzüglich, ich schwöre es beim Thron!"
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier zupft nervös an seinem Kragen herum, der ihm wohl plötzlich zu eng geworden ist.{/n} "W-Wir korrigieren das. Unverzüglich, ich schwöre es beim Thron!"

languages.text: {n}Subay, bir anda rahatsızlık verecek derecede sıkmaya başlamışçasına gergince yakasını çekiştiriyor.{/n} "Bu... Bu konuyla ilgileneceğiz. Derhâl. Taht üzerine yemin ederim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The officer tugs nervously at his collar, which appears to have suddenly become too tight for his comfort.{/n} "W-we will fix this. Right away, I swear it on the Throne!"
